DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the safety, tolerability, and antiviral efficacy of ledipasvir/sofosbuvir (LDV/SOF) fixed-dose combination (FDC) administered for 12 or 24 weeks in adults with genotype 1 or 4 hepatitis C virus (HCV) infection with sickle cell disease (SCD).
DOC.brief_title: Ledipasvir/Sofosbuvir Fixed-Dose Combination for 12 or 24 Weeks in Genotype 1 or 4 HCV Infected Adults With Sickle Cell Disease
